attributes.action: Stop government aid to foreign countries in times of crisis in uk! Save our own first!
attributes.additional_details:
This government send billions of pounds abroad for aid, however out country is in dire need if help! I think OUR money should help rebuild homes, help farmers, help poverty stricken people, help homeless etc especially with the flooding! I find it shocking we give away SO much money to help others in foreign places when we should be helping our own!

Get our country sorted first! Reduce
Our country's debt! Then think about helping others!
